name: One Bullet left
description: Start with nothing and try to erase every enemies in the area. To help you along your way is a large selection of gadgets, weapons and triggerable stuff and bullet time management to assassinate your targets in any way you like. Your main weapon is pistol,rifle for now but we are planning to add many other weapons and gadgets.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: i5 2500K Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560Ti DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: window 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
